title: Pakwheels Used Cars Scraper
description: Scrape used car listings from Pakwheels.com. Filter by city, make, model, price range, and year. Returns detailed car data including price, mileage, fuel type, and more.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct Pakwheels search URL. Overrides all other filters if provided.

city.title: City
city.description: Filter by city (e.g., Lahore, Karachi, Islamabad, Rawalpindi, Peshawar, Faisalabad, Multan).

make.title: Car Make
make.description: Filter by car manufacturer (e.g., Toyota, Honda, Suzuki, Hyundai, KIA).

model.title: Car Model
model.description: Filter by specific model (e.g., Corolla, Civic, City, Cultus). Works best when Make is also specified.

minPrice.title: Minimum Price (PKR)
minPrice.description: Minimum price filter in Pakistani Rupees.

maxPrice.title: Maximum Price (PKR)
maxPrice.description: Maximum price filter in Pakistani Rupees.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of car listings to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Maximum number of search result pages to scrape.
